donor_name: United Nations Institute for Training and Research
UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: This project is in its inception phase for the development of a framework for national response to climate change. The project has four components: a) Institutional Building; b) Climate Change Risk and Adaptation Assessments; c) Strategic/ Programmatic Investment Analyses and Interventions; d) National Framework
